item.title: Large items left on street cluttering footpath, 16th September
item.description:
Large items always left beside the bins which themselves are overflowing. It clea the street making it difficult for those with mobility issues or buggies. It's dangerous and unsightly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 219-229, Gordon Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping and litter roadway behind post office, 16th September
item.description:
There is frequent fly tipping and rubbish behind the post office and creams buisness which was agreed previously with the council for regular cleaning, but now has stopped.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Chase Side, Southgate, London

item.title: I caught the lady on dash cam and on my phone dumping all rubbish on the street, 16th September
item.description:
I caught the lady on dash cam and on my phone dumping all her rubbish on the street and her admitting she was doing it I have recordings if needed, I made her take it all back in to her garden. Can Greenwich please deal with them as we now know where all the rubbish is coming from

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vandyke Cross, Middle Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
